summary.span: 定义表示 UI 控件的组成部分或支持控件复合模型的类。

span.span: Defines classes that represent the component parts of UI controls, or otherwise support the control composition model.

summary.span: 此外，还定义控件模式（如对齐和选择）的接口。

span.span: Also defines interfaces for control patterns such as snapping and selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间文档包含仅.NET 投影的投影的 WinRT 类型与不同的 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 类型。This namespace documentation contains only .NET projections of Windows Runtime (WinRT) types where the projection differs from the WinRT type. 若要查看此命名空间类型的完整列表，请参阅[Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.controls.primitives) UWP API 参考。To see the complete list of types for this namespace, see [Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.controls.primitives) in the UWP API reference.
